🚀 FASTEST PATH TO PDF (2 MINUTES):

1. Double-click: manuscript-formatted.html
2. Press: Ctrl+P (or Cmd+P on Mac)
3. Choose: Save as PDF
4. Set size: Custom → Width: 6 inches, Height: 9 inches
5. Enable: Background graphics
6. Click: Save

✅ You now have a KDP-ready PDF!
